text: Honestly cannot wait to receive it, but especially my son and my parents/his grandparents to receive it. So grateful to anyone working to make this happen and in the same year #COVID19 hit. Amazing. 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻 #ScienceIsReal #TrustScience #Science #pandemic #vaccine #Scientists https://t.co/WKCXzWKvaX
